summary: A Bodyslide 2 conversion of Dragon Lilly CBBE
descriptionHtml:
===================================================

BodySlide 2 Conversion for Dragon Lilly - CBBE
Author: MightionNY

Contact: MightionNY
E-mail - shinyknight@roadrunner.com

===================================================

Version: 1.2
Date: 1/29/2015

Minor clipping issues fixed on the dress

Reweighted the armlets - they're much less likely to distort due to arm movement (which you pretty much only see with pose mods)

Version: 1.1
Date: 1/28/2015

Vastly reduced clipping on the legs.


Version: 1.0
Date: 1/28/2015

This mod is a conversion of Dragon Lilly - CBBE by betterbecause. It is a set of BodySlide 2 outfit sliders for that mod. It requires the original mod - it does not include any meshes, textures, or .esp from the original mod. 
It was built around the CBBE Body HDT found in CBBE v3.3.

The original mod can be found at: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62045/?

Requirements:
Bodyslide 2 (v2.2 or later)
The original mod, linked above
A working CBBE + HDT compatible body with extended XP32 skeleton

Usage:
Extract this file into your Skyrim folder, or use Nexus Mod Manager.  When you next run Bodyslide 2, the new outfits should be listed; Sliders are included for the Dress and the armlets. Just type "Lill" into the Outfit Filter and they should show up when you hit Batch Build.

Disclaimers:

While I did check all sliders for clipping using Outfit Studio, I will not guarantee an absence of clipping if extreme settings or combinations of extreme settings are used. :D  I will guarantee if you use a CBBE Classic preset with a setnpcweight of 40, you shouldn't see any. :D 

I use CBBE HDT, if you use just BBP or TBBP (non-HDT); I can't guarantee it will work for you.

I did nothing to the boots and/or the High Heels functionality.

Known Issues:

Credits and thanks:
-Caliente for CBBE, Bodyslide, and Outfit Studio
-betterbecause for the original mod
-Optiuq for the original source mod

Permissions:
Please feel free to use this as a base if someone wants to do a (T)BBP conversion or some such.
author: MightionNY

files.name: Dragon Lilly Bodyslide v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
- Reweighted the armlets so they handle poses better
- Minor clipping fixes on the dress
- Removed "HDT" from the name due to redundancy (the source mod already requires HDT)
